catalog_script_client.name: GetCountryGlideAjax

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_c9b9c6a397b9d1106881bf36f053af38
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="New User Ex1">30b3b8d797b591106881bf36f053af29</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:f2e8b81f97b591106881bf36f053afbd</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>GetCountryGlideAjax</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue ) {
      return;
   }

	// Instanciate the GlideAjax Object
	var getCountryData = new GlideAjax('GetCompanyData');
	
	/* Using methods inherited from global.AbstractAjaxProcessor
	 sends the parameters to server */
	getCountryData.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCountry');
	getCountryData.addParam('sysparm_companyID', g_form.getValue('u_company'));
	
	// get XML response from function 
	getCountryData.getXML(populateCountryField);
	
	// Clear and populates field with the answer from server
	function populateCountryField(response){
		var countryFromScripInclude = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		g_form.clearValue('u_company_country');
		g_form.setValue('u_company_country', countryFromScripInclude);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-13 22:59:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c9b9c6a397b9d1106881bf36f053af38</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetCountryGlideAjax</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c9b9c6a397b9d1106881bf36f053af38</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-14 18:07:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
